China: Battle of Bạch Đằng: Đại Việt decisively defeated a numerically superior Yuan invasion fleet on the Bạch Đằng River.
Poland:
Death of Leszek II the Black
Władysław I Łokietek (the Elbow-high) inherits the lands of Poland
Spain: Alfonso the Liberal released Alfonso de la Cerda from captivity in the fortress at Xàtiva and declared him king of Castile and León.
